memories.title: Desiging in Taiwan in Acer Inc.
memories.description: ออกแบบจาก Acer Inc. ประเทศไต้หวัน จุดเริ่มต้นของการเดินทาง ก่อนจะคลอดและประกอบออกมาจากโรงงานที่ประเทศจีน ก่อนจะเดินทางมาที่ประเทศไทย

memories.title: Beach Coding Sessions
memories.description: Those magical evenings coding by the beach, with Malang's screen reflecting the sunset. Working on my first major project while listening to the waves.

memories.title: Mountain Retreat Coding
memories.description: Taking Malang to the mountains for a coding retreat. The cool air and stunning views provided the perfect environment for deep focus and breakthrough moments.

memories.title: Bangkok Tech Conference
memories.description: Our first major tech conference together. Malang performed flawlessly during my presentation, helping me connect with the tech community in Bangkok.

memories.title: Night Market Adventures
memories.description: Working on freelance projects at a 24-hour café near Chatuchak. The vibrant energy of Bangkok's night markets fueled our late-night coding sessions.

memories.title: Island Paradise Development
memories.description: Building a tourism website while actually experiencing island paradise. Malang handled the humidity like a champ while we created something beautiful.

memories.title: International Adventure - Singapore
memories.description: Our first international trip together! Working from the iconic Marina Bay Sands area, Malang and I tackled cross-border e-commerce projects with the stunning Singapore skyline as our backdrop.

memories.title: Rural Innovation Project
memories.description: Bringing technology to rural communities. Malang helped me develop agricultural apps while surrounded by beautiful rice fields and traditional Thai architecture.

memories.title: Startup Launch in Phuket
memories.description: Launching our startup from a beachside co-working space. Malang never missed a beat during our investor calls, even with the sound of waves in the background.

memories.title: New Year Reflection
memories.description: Starting 2025 with reflection and planning. Under the stars in Khao Yai, Malang and I outlined our goals for the year ahead, surrounded by nature's tranquility.
